EmailTemplate.name: Module Started
EmailTemplate.subject: Module Started
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi again {!FieloELR__ModuleResponse__c.FieloELR__Member__r.Name},
You’ve just started a new module – {!FieloELR__ModuleResponse__c.FieloELR__Module__r.Name} from course {!FieloELR__ModuleResponse__c.FieloELR__CourseStatus__r.FieloELR__Course__r.Name}.
Keep up the excellent work!
Best,
<Company Name>
